We saw this same bundle offered during the brand’s full November holiday event, with it coming back around for another chance at $750 in total savings at the best price of 2025. items.title: EcoFlow’s latest 48-hour Xmas flash sale drops DELTA 3 Max + TRAIL 200 DC power stations to new $1,049 bundle low, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, EcoFlow has launched the next of its seasonal 48-hour flash sales with up to 45% discounts across four varying offers that will run through December 13. One notable standout is the latest DELTA 3 Max Plus Portable Power Station with a FREE Trail 200 DC 60,000mAh power station ($200 value) at $1,049 shipped, which beats out its Amazon pricing by $50 (and that offer doesn’t include the free extra station either). We saw this same bundle offered as an early Black Friday flash deal at $1,099 from the station’s $1,899 MSRP, though at Amazon, it’s been regularly falling to $1,099 and even dropped as low as $1,044 the week of Black Friday, though again, there was no bonus station bundled with it. All-in-all, with the bundled TRAIL station, you’re getting $850 savings here ($1,050 considering the TRAIL’s $200 value) for the next two days, landing these two units down at the best price we have tracked. Head below to learn more and check out the three other flash offers while they’re still around.

more…

items.title: Today’s best Apple Books and audiobook deals from $2
items.summary:
Your Friday afternoon edition of the best Apple Books deals are now ready to roll. Today’s lineup includes both traditional reads and audiobooks like The Challenger Sale, The Diary of a Young Girl by Anne Frank, Astoria by Peter Stark, The Lightning Thief by Rick Riordan, The House of Hades, and more. Just be sure to scope out the best price of the year on M4 MacBook Air 13-inch models that are now $250 off with a FREE $25 gift card attached alongside the ongoing Amazon all-time low on AirPods Pro 3 – this deal could disappear at anytime now. Hit the jump for a rundown of today’s best Apple Books deals. 

more…

items.title: Don’t like cramped MagSafe wallets? This bifold with Apple Find My holds 9 cards + 15 bills for just $24 (Save 52%)
items.summary:
Courtesy of ESR’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score the brand’s ESR Geo Wallet with Find My in black for $23.99 Prime shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo code OPCCW7FH to see the discounted price during checkout. Also, folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. After launching on Kickstarter last year for $38, this model hit Amazon with a $50 list price. It’s dipped to $29 before, but today’s 52% discount cuts another $5 off, bringing it to a new all-time low. This is the best price we’ve seen for this bi-fold wallet, so don’t miss your chance to grab it after checking out the details below.

more…
